descriptionHtml:
Hey guys 1st texture mod.

 I am going to do a series of Bloody battle scared armour variants. 
I feel my re textures add a more barbaric feel to your apperance.
Currently there is blood and scorch marks from fire.
I would like all feedback even if its negative:)
I have even added a tattoo on the back

If you want a specific type tatoo msg and ill make it, any where on the body

INSTALLATION

Place the folder into your texture folder, like you would any other armour mod.
author: AusRivo
